sections.title: Questions - Other provisions related to reporting  - Article 17

questions.title: Cooperation When Public Awareness Is Needed
questions.content: If the CSIRT determines that public awareness is necessary to prevent or mitigate a severe incident affecting your product, are you prepared to cooperate with the CSIRT and ENISA, and provide any information required for them to inform the public or issue warnings?

questions.title: Impact of Notifications on Legal Liability
questions.content: Do you understand that submitting notifications under Articles 14 and 15 does _not_ increase your legal liability or subject you to additional penalties beyond what already applies?

responses.title: In Progress
